functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"meleeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"teran",Effect:"str3_has3",display:{Name:"\"§6Trillon\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Insatiable, il amassa cent âmes\"}","{\"text\":\"§7puis courut à sa perte.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Insatiable, he gathered a hundred souls\"}","{\"text\":\"§7before running to his death.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7HAS§a3\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:12s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_damage,Name:generic.attack_damage,Amount:32.17,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,10001,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.63,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,20001,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.02,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,30001,0,10000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"meleeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"traditional",Effect:"str3_spd2",display:{Name:"\"§6Requiem du jour\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La lumière n'est qu'illusoire, tout\"}","{\"text\":\"§7n'est que nuit et ne se révèle qu'alors.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The light is only illusory, everything\"}","{\"text\":\"§7is night and is only revealed then.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a2\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:bane_of_arthropods",lvl:4s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:2s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_damage,Name:generic.attack_damage,Amount:11.67,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:-0.29000000000000004,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,10000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"harmonious",Effect:"str3_res1",display:{Name:"\"§6Morion des Lorth\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Bien qu’amène et prompt à conseiller ses congénères,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7dissimule son visage d’une bien étrange façon.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Although prompt to counsel others,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7conceals his face in a strange way.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7RES§a1\"}"]},Damage:15,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:4.47,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,10001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:1.29,Operation:1,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,20001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:1.0,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,30001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.01,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,30001,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"harmonious",Effect:"str2_has2_her1",display:{Name:"\"§6Toute-puissante Thoréën\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7D'une supériorité quasi-imperceptible, elle exacerbe\"}","{\"text\":\"§7du soma jusqu'à l'obstination de son porteur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Of a quasi-imperceptible superiority, it exacerbates\"}","{\"text\":\"§7from soma to the obstinacy of its carrier.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a2 §7HER§a1\"}"]},Damage:75,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:3s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:14.04,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:3.9,Operation:1,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:1.0,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,30002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.01,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,30002,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"harmonious",Effect:"str2_luc2",display:{Name:"\"§6Irrévocable recours du juste\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Autrefois porté par les gardiens auto-proclamés de la vertu,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7eux pour qui même la peur ne sut jamais ployer.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Formerly worn by the self-proclaimed guardians of virtue,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7or whom even fear could never bend.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7LUC§a2\"}"]},Damage:50,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:3s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:7.68,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:3.79,Operation:1,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:1.0,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.01,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"harmonious",Effect:"str3_dar2_hun1",display:{Name:"\"§6Silence de Sylberländ\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7§kIl est des choses qu'aucun ne voudrait entendre.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7DAR§a2 §7HUN§a1\"}"]},Damage:25,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:2.77,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,10004,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:2.21,Operation:1,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,20004,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:1.0,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,30004,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.01,Operation:0,Slot:feet,UUID:[I;0,30004,0,20000]}]}
